sorular.soru: How long should you rest after you have driven for 2 hours?

feedback.metin: Fatigue can make you drive as badly as if you drank a couple of alcoholic drinks.  Do not drive when you are fatigued. Do you have to drive for a while? Take a break of at least 15 minutes every 2 hours.

sorular.soru: How fast should your motor vehicle at least be allowed and able to drive to use this road?

feedback.metin: To be allowed to use the motorway, your vehicle must be able and allowed to drive at least 60 km/h. On autowegen, this is 50 km/h.
